name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
work_experience: 12 years of experience in Cardiology, including working at Apollo Hospital and United Hospital.
about: Dr. Sarah Ahmed is a highly qualified and experienced cardiologist, dedicated to providing compassionate care to patients with heart-related issues.
education: MBBS from Dhaka Medical College, MD in Cardiology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University.

name: Dr. Michael Khan
work_experience: 15 years of experience in Orthopedics, previously associated with Square Hospital and National Institute of Traumatology.
about: Dr. Michael Khan specializes in treating musculoskeletal problems, providing surgical and non-surgical solutions for patients of all ages.
education: MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical College, MS in Orthopedics from Dhaka University.

name: Dr. Alia Chowdhury
work_experience: 10 years of experience in Pediatrics, working in both public and private sectors including Dhaka Shishu Hospital.
about: Dr. Alia Chowdhury is a caring pediatrician dedicated to providing medical care to infants, children, and adolescents in a friendly and supportive environment.
education: MBBS from Chittagong Medical College, MD in Pediatrics from BSMMU.
